name: Bel'Veth
subtitle: the Empress of the Void
description: A nightmarish empress created from the raw material of an entire devoured city, Bel'Veth is the end of Runeterra itself... and the beginning of a monstrous reality of her own design. Driven by epochs of repurposed history, knowledge, and memories from the world above, she voraciously feeds an ever-expanding need for new experiences and emotions, consuming all that crosses her path. Yet her wants could never be sated by only one world as she turns her hungry eyes toward the Void's old masters...

abilities.name: Death in Lavender
abilities.description: Bel'Veth gains permanent attack speed stacks after taking down large minions and monsters and champions. She also gains temporary bonus attack speed after using an ability.

abilities.name: Void Surge
abilities.description: Bel'Veth dashes in a chosen direction and damages all enemies she passes through.

abilities.name: Above and Below
abilities.description: Bel'Veth slams her tail to the ground, damaging, knocking up, and slowing her enemies.

abilities.name: Royal Maelstrom
abilities.description: Bel'Veth roots herself in place, channeling a storm of slashes around her that targets the lowest-health enemy and grants her lifesteal and damage reduction.
